method.name: GetSupportCurve
method.abstract: This method returns the Curve on which the Arc is lying.

method.name: SetSupportCurve
method.abstract: This method changes the Curve on which the Arc is lying.

method.name: SetCircleData
method.abstract: Defines the circle's parameters.

method.name: GetConicParm
method.abstract: Gets the conic parameter.

method.name: GetEndTangent
method.abstract: Gets the tangent at the end point.

method.name: GetFirstIntermediatePoint
method.abstract: Gets the first intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: GetFirstIntermediateTangent
method.abstract: Gets the tangent at the first intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: GetSecondIntermediatePoint
method.abstract: Gets the second intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: GetSecondIntermediateTangent
method.abstract: Gets the tangent at the second intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: GetStartTangent
method.abstract: Gets the tangent at the start point.

method.name: GetTangentIntersectionPoint
method.abstract: Gets the tangent intersection reference point.

method.name: GetThirdIntermediatePoint
method.abstract: Gets the third intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: SetConicParm
method.abstract: Sets the conic parameter.

method.name: SetEndTangent
method.abstract: Sets the end tangent.

method.name: SetFirstIntermediatePoint
method.abstract: Sets the first intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: SetFirstIntermediateTangent
method.abstract: Sets the tangent at the first intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: SetSecondIntermediatePoint
method.abstract: Sets the second intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: SetSecondIntermediateTangent
method.abstract: Sets the tangent at the second intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: SetStartTangent
method.abstract: Sets the start tangent.

method.name: SetTangentIntersectionPoint
method.abstract: Sets the tangent intersection reference point.

method.name: SetThirdIntermediatePoint
method.abstract: Sets the third intermediate passing thru point.

method.name: GetFirstContinuity
method.abstract: Gets the first continuity.

method.name: GetFirstCurve
method.abstract: Gets the first reference curve.

method.name: GetFirstOrientation
method.abstract: Gets the first orientation.

method.name: GetFirstPoint
method.abstract: Gets the first reference point.

method.name: GetFirstTension
method.abstract: Gets the first tension.

method.name: GetSecondContinuity
method.abstract: Gets the second continuity.

method.name: GetSecondCurve
method.abstract: Gets the second reference curve.

method.name: GetSecondOrientation
method.abstract: Gets the second orientation.

method.name: GetSecondPoint
method.abstract: Gets the second reference point.

method.name: GetSecondTension
method.abstract: Gets the second tension.

method.name: SetFirstContinuity
method.abstract: Sets the first continuity.

method.name: SetFirstCurve
method.abstract: Sets the first reference curve.

method.name: SetFirstOrientation
method.abstract: Sets the first orientation.

method.name: SetFirstPoint
method.abstract: Sets the first reference point.

method.name: SetFirstTension
method.abstract: Gets the first tension.

method.name: SetSecondContinuity
method.abstract: Sets the second continuity.

method.name: SetSecondCurve
method.abstract: Sets the second reference curve.

method.name: SetSecondOrientation
method.abstract: Sets the second orientation.

method.name: SetSecondPoint
method.abstract: Sets the second reference point.

method.name: SetSecondTension
method.abstract: Gets the first tension.

method.name: Get2DCstType
method.abstract: Returns the kind of the 2D constraint.

method.name: SwapChirality
method.abstract: Swap the orientation 2D constraint.

method.name: Analyse
method.abstract: Analyse given geometric elements (1, 2 or 3) and returns a list of POSSIBLE constraint types on these elements.

method.name: CheckDefinition
method.abstract: Verify if a constraint creation is compatible with elements types.

method.name: CheckImport
method.abstract: Verify if a geometry can be imported.

method.name: Find
method.abstract: Analyse given geometric elements (1, 2 or 3) and returns a list of EXISTING constraint types on these elements.

method.name: Find
method.abstract: Analyse given geometric elements (1, 2 or 3) and returns a list of EXISTING constraint on these elements.

method.name: Find
method.abstract: Analyse given geometric elements and returns the list of EXISTING constraints on these elements only and the list of EXISTING constraints pointing on one of these elements.

method.name: CreateConstraint
method.abstract: Creates a constraint.

method.name: GetDiagnostic
method.abstract: Acces to diagnostic on geometry obtain during last evaluation.

method.name: GetUnderDefinedStatus
method.abstract: Acces to underdefined status on geometry obtain during last evaluation.

method.name: GetCurvature
method.abstract: Get Curvature coordinates.

method.name: GetCurvature
method.abstract: Get Curvature norm as a CATICkeParm.

method.name: GetTangent
method.abstract: Get Tangent Direction.

method.name: SetCurvature
method.abstract: Define Curvature coordinates.

method.name: SetCurvature
method.abstract: Define Curvature norm as a CATICkeParm.

method.name: SetTangent
method.abstract: Set Tangent Direction.

method.name: UnsetCurvature
method.abstract: Unset Curvature.

method.name: UnsetTangent
method.abstract: Unset Tangent Direction.

method.name: GetDiscretisation
method.abstract: Returns a discretisation of the curve satisfying a given sag.

method.name: GetEndPoint
method.abstract: Returns (or create) the end point of the 2D curve.

method.name: GetStartPoint
method.abstract: Returns (or create) the start point of the 2D curve.

method.name: IsATrimmedCurve
method.abstract: Tells if curve is trimmed.

method.name: IsClosed
method.abstract: Tells if curve is closed.

method.name: IsParamReversed
method.abstract: Tells if the edge chooses a specific direction of parameterization as its inerent one.

method.name: ReadEndPoint
method.abstract: Returns the end point of the 2D curve.

method.name: ReadStartPoint
method.abstract: Returns the start point of the 2D curve.

method.name: ReverseParam
method.abstract: Reverses the direction of the parametrization.

method.name: SetEndPoint
method.abstract: Defines the end point coordinates of the 2D curve.

method.name: SetEndPoint
method.abstract: Defines the end point of the 2D curve.

method.name: SetStartPoint
method.abstract: Defines the start point coordinates of the 2D curve.

method.name: SetStartPoint
method.abstract: Defines the start point of the 2D curve.

class.name: CATI2DDatumCurve
class.abstract: Interface representing a Sketcher datum curve.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Returns the CATPCurve of <tt>this</tt> datum curve.

method.name: SetCurve
method.abstract: Sets the geometric CATPCurve of <tt>this</tt> datum curve.

class.name: CATI2DDetailFactory
class.abstract: Provides the client with the functionality for creating 2D detail.

method.name: CreateDetail
method.abstract: Create a 2D Detail.

method.name: GetDirectionData
method.abstract: Returns the informations that fully describes the direction.

method.name: SetDirectionData
method.abstract: Defines the informations that fully describes the direction.

method.name: Get2DAxisMatrix
method.abstract: Read the position matrix of the ditto.

method.name: GetDetail
method.abstract: Returns the associated detail.

method.name: Set2DAxisMatrix
method.abstract: Define the position matrix of the ditto.

method.name: GetCenter
method.abstract: Returns the ellipse's center.

method.name: SetCenter
method.abstract: Defines the ellipse's center.

method.name: SetEllipseData
method.abstract: Defines the ellipse's parameters.

class.name: CATI2DEquivalentGeometry
class.abstract: Access to result geometry from a sketch element.

class.name: CATI2DEquivalentTopology
class.abstract: Access to a topological result from a sketch element into a specified geometrical container.

method.name: GetGeometries
method.abstract: Gets the geometries inside of Fix Together Constraint.

method.name: SetGeometries
method.abstract: Sets the geometries inside of Fix Together Constraint.

method.name: Distance
method.abstract: Computes the distance between two geometric elements.

method.name: Distance
method.abstract: Computes the distance between two geometric elements.

method.name: Distance
method.abstract: Computes the distance between a geometry and a line.

method.name: Intersection
method.abstract: Computes the nearest intersection point from a given point between two curves.

method.name: Intersection
method.abstract: Computes the nearest intersection point from a given point between a curve and a circle.

method.name: Intersection
method.abstract: Computes the intersection points between two curves, according to an eventual tolerance.

method.name: IsClosed
method.abstract: Checks if a curve is closed.

method.name: IsPtInside
method.abstract: Checks if a point is inside a contour.

method.name: Projection
method.abstract: Computes the directed projection of a point on a courbe.

class.name: CATI2DHybConstraint
class.abstract: Interface to manage a hybrid constraint.

method.name: AddConstraint
method.abstract: Plugs the hybrid constraint in the solver.

method.name: Analyse
method.abstract: Analyse the hybrid constraint and returns a list of POSSIBLE constraint types according to the referenced elements.

method.name: Get2DCstType
method.abstract: Returns the kind of the hybrid constraint.

method.name: GetElements
method.abstract: Retrieves the constrained geometries.

method.name: GetHyperbolaData
method.abstract: Returns the hyperbola's parameters.

method.name: SetHyperbolaData
method.abstract: Defines the hyperbola's parameters.

method.name: SetChamfer
method.abstract: Modifies a chamfer segment.

method.name: SetLineData
method.abstract: Modifies a 2D Line.

class.name: CATI2DOffset
class.abstract: The methods of this interface handle offset geometrical elements.

method.name: GetCornerType
method.abstract: Retrieves the relimitation type.

method.name: GetOffsetParm
method.abstract: Retrieves the offset value as a literal.

method.name: GetReferenceGeometry
method.abstract: Retrieves the reference geometry that is offseted.

method.name: SetCornerType
method.abstract: Sets the relimitation type.

method.name: SetReferenceGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the reference geometry to offset.

class.name: CATI2DOffsetOperator
class.abstract: The methods of this interface handle an offset use-edge operator (the offset reference element does not belong to the sketch).

method.name: GetInitGeometry
method.abstract: Retrieves the optional init geometry.

method.name: GetOperMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the use-edge offset operation mode (project or intersect the external geometry to offset).

method.name: GetPropagationType
method.abstract: Retrieves the propagation type.

method.name: SetInitGeometry
method.abstract: Sets the optional init geometry.

method.name: SetOperMode
method.abstract: Sets the use-edge offset operation mode.

method.name: SetPropagationType
method.abstract: Sets the propagation type.

class.name: CATI2DOutParameters
class.abstract: Interface de base des resultats des operateurs.

method.name: GetParabolaData
method.abstract: Returns the parabola's parameters.

method.name: SetParabolaData
method.abstract: Defines the parabola's parameters.

method.name: SetPointData
method.abstract: Modifies the coordinates of 2D Point.

class.name: CATI2DPolyline
class.abstract: The methods of this interface provide the client with the functionality for managing 2DPolyline.

method.name: AddLastPoint
method.abstract: Inserts control point in the spline at the last position.

method.name: Compute
method.abstract: Computes the spline, according to the recorded control points.

method.name: GetClosure
method.abstract: Gets whether the curve is closed.

method.name: GetCstPoints
method.abstract: Gives the list of the control points of the spline.

method.name: InsertControlPointAfter
method.abstract: Inserts control point in the spline.

method.name: RemovePoint
method.abstract: Removes control point in the spline.

method.name: SetClosure
method.abstract: Sets whether the curve is closed.

class.name: CATI2DTopologicalOperators
class.abstract: Topological Operators Interface on 2D Geometrical Features.

method.name: Break
method.abstract: Breaks a monoparametric element by a point.

method.name: GetIncidentCurves
method.abstract: Looks for the elements relimited by a input point (and the construction elements too).

method.name: InsertChamfer
method.abstract: Inserts a soon created chamfer between two curves and informs about their relimitations.

method.name: InsertCorner
method.abstract: Inserts a soon created corner between two curves and informs about their relimitations.

method.name: QuickRelimit
method.abstract: Breaks and relimits a monoparametric element, onto the next intersections with the other elements in the sketch.

method.name: Relimit
method.abstract: Informs of the relimitation of two monoparametric elements.

method.name: Relimit
method.abstract: Informs of the relimitation of two monoparametric elements.

class.name: CATI2DWFFactory
class.abstract: Provides the client with the functionality for creating 2D geometric elements.

method.name: CreateArc
method.abstract: Creates an Arc on a 2D Curve.

method.name: CreateCenterLine
method.abstract: Creates a 2D axis line.

method.name: CreateChamfer
method.abstract: Creates a chamfer segment.

method.name: CreateCircle
method.abstract: Creates a 2D circle.

method.name: CreateCircle
method.abstract: Creates a 2D arc through three points.

method.name: CreateCircle
method.abstract: Creates a 2D arc.

method.name: CreateCircleTgt
method.abstract: Creates a 2D arc with two points and a tangent.

method.name: CreateConicCurve
method.abstract: Creates a 2D conic curve.

method.name: CreateConnectCurve
method.abstract: Creates a 2D connecting curve between two 2D curves.

method.name: CreateConstructionCircle
method.abstract: Creates a 2D construction circle.

method.name: CreateConstructionLine
method.abstract: Creates a 2D construction line.

method.name: CreateCorner
method.abstract: Creates a bi-tangent arc.

method.name: CreateCstPoint
method.abstract: Creates a 2D control point.

method.name: CreateCubicSplineCurve
method.abstract: Creates a 2D cubic spline curve (degree = 3).

method.name: CreateEllipse
method.abstract: Creates a 2D ellipse.

method.name: CreateEllipse
method.abstract: Creates a 2D arc of ellipse.

method.name: CreateHyperbola
method.abstract: Creates a 2D hyperbola.

method.name: CreateHyperbola
method.abstract: Creates a 2D hyperbola.

method.name: CreateLine
method.abstract: Creates a 2D line.

method.name: CreateLine
method.abstract: Creates a 2D line.

method.name: CreateOffsetCurve
method.abstract: Creates a 2D offset curve of a 2D curve.

method.name: CreateOutput
method.abstract: Creates a 2D Output Geometry from 2D Geometry.

method.name: CreateOutputProfile
method.abstract: Creates a 2D Output Profile from 2D Geometries.

method.name: CreateParabola
method.abstract: Creates a 2D parabola.

method.name: CreateParabola
method.abstract: Creates a 2D parabola.

method.name: CreatePoint
method.abstract: Creates a 2D point.

method.name: CreateSplineCurve
method.abstract: Creates a 2D quintic spline curve (degree = 5).

method.name: CreateUnspec
method.abstract: Creates a curve from a CATPCurve object.

method.name: Duplicate
method.abstract: Duplicates a set of 2D geometries and applies a transformation to the result.

method.name: FixTogether
method.abstract: Creates a Fix Together Constraint (rigid set) of 2D Geometries.

method.name: InstanciateDitto
method.abstract: Instanciate a ditto from a detail.

method.name: IntersectGeometry
method.abstract: Intersects 3D or 2D external geometry.

method.name: OffsetGeometry
method.abstract: Offsets 3D geometry.

method.name: ProjectGeometry
method.abstract: Projects 3D or 2D external geometry on a sketch.

method.name: SilhouetteGeometry
method.abstract: Creates the silhouette of a surface.

class.name: CATI2DWFGeometry
class.abstract: Interface of 2D Geometry for sketch elements.

method.name: GetFamily
method.abstract: Returns the family of the geometric element.

method.name: WasCreated
method.abstract: To known if the geometry was created during the current sketch edition.

method.name: WasModified
method.abstract: To known if the geometry was modified or created during the current sketch edition.

method.name: AfterMove
method.abstract: Allows to restore normal behavior after moving.

method.name: BeforeMove
method.abstract: Allows to take any kind of measure before moving.

method.name: GetMovable
method.abstract: Gives the list of elements which have to be transformated to transform the element itself.

method.name: Move
method.abstract: Geometric transformation of 2D elements.

class.name: CATISketch
class.abstract: The methods of this interface provide the client with the functionality for handling a sketch.

method.name: AttachToPlane
method.abstract: Defines the planar support of the sketch (the sketch becomes Sliding).

method.name: GetAbsolute2DAxis
method.abstract: Returns the absolute axis of the sketch.

method.name: GetAxisData
method.abstract: Returns the position of the sketch in space.

method.name: GetComponents
method.abstract: Retrieves all geometries.

method.name: GetCurrentCenterLine
method.abstract: Returns the (unique) center line of the sketch.

method.name: GetPlanarSupport
method.abstract: Returns the planar support of the sketch.

method.name: IsEmpty
method.abstract: Tells if the sketch is empty.

method.name: Isolate
method.abstract: Isolates the projected and intersected Geometries.

method.name: SetAxisData
method.abstract: Defines the position of the sketch in space.

method.name: SetCurrentCenterLine
method.abstract: Defines the (unique) center line of the sketch.

class.name: CATISketchEditor
class.abstract: The methods of this interface provide the client with the functionality for handling the sketch's geometry.

method.name: CloseEdition
method.abstract: Close edition.

method.name: Evaluate
method.abstract: Evaluation of geometric elements with respect to constraints.

method.name: Evaluate
method.abstract: Geometry evaluation with soft reference.

method.name: InEdition
method.abstract: Tells if edition is opened.

method.name: OpenEdition
method.abstract: Open edition.

method.name: ResetGroup
method.abstract: Reset the current group of geometric elements.

method.name: SaveEdition
method.abstract: Save edition.

method.name: SetGroup
method.abstract: Set the current group of geometric elements.

method.name: Transform
method.abstract: Transformation and evaluation of a group of geometric element.

method.name: TransformGroup
method.abstract: Transformation of the current group of geometric elements under constraints.

method.name: GetSketch
method.abstract: Returns the sketch that contains the element.

class.name: CATISketchExternalReferences
class.abstract: Interface to manage the external references of a sketch.

method.name: CreateSketch
method.abstract: Creates a Sketch.

method.name: CreateSketch
method.abstract: Creates a Sketch.

class.name: CATISketchPositioning
class.abstract: Interface to manage the positioning of a sketch.

method.name: EvalPosition
method.abstract: Compute, evaluate and analyze the new position of the sketch.

method.name: GetDirectionCoordinates
method.abstract: Retrieves the direction coordinates for orientation.

method.name: GetHDirectionSense
method.abstract: Retrieves the Horizontal direction.

method.name: GetNormalSense
method.abstract: Retrieves the Normal direction.

method.name: GetOrientationDirection
method.abstract: Retrieves the direction of the sketch axis which is oriented.

method.name: GetOrientationMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the orientation definition mode.

method.name: GetOrientationReferences
method.abstract: Retrieves the orientation reference elements.

method.name: GetOriginMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the origin definition mode.

method.name: GetOriginReferences
method.abstract: Retrieves the origin reference elements.

method.name: GetSupportMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the support definition mode.

method.name: GetSupportReferences
method.abstract: Retrieves the support reference elements.

method.name: GetVDirectionSense
method.abstract: Retrieves the Vertical direction.

method.name: ReverseHDirection
method.abstract: Reverses the Horizontal direction.

method.name: ReverseVDirection
method.abstract: Reverses the Vertical direction.

method.name: SetOrientationDirection
method.abstract: Sets the oriented direction of the sketch axis.

method.name: SetOrientationMode
method.abstract: Sets the orientation definition mode.

method.name: SetOrientationReferences
method.abstract: Sets the orientation reference elements.

method.name: SetOriginMode
method.abstract: Sets the origin definition mode.

method.name: SetOriginReferences
method.abstract: Sets the origin reference elements and definition mode.

method.name: SetSupportMode
method.abstract: Sets the support definition mode.

method.name: SetSupportReferences
method.abstract: Sets the support reference elements.

method.name: SwapHVDirections
method.abstract: Swaps the Horizontal and Vertical directions.
